attributes.additional_details:
Easter eggs not being allowed to be called Easter eggs 
Christmas being called winter holidays
attributes.background: We are forever hearing about the government or companies changing the way items or events are named incase it offends other religious beliefs well it's our religious beliefs that are being affected whilst keeping other religions happy this is a Christian country

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament haven't banned Easter eggs being called Easter eggs, or required Christmas to be called the winter holidays.

If companies have done this, that's a matter for the individual company and not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.
